title: Please buff/rework Orianna
body: This champion is so off meta and can literally get pooped on by ever mid laner in the game, early game she is just as useless as singed, her health is low, runs out of mana quick, and no damage at all until mid to late game, please fix this champion, she just so bad.

replies.body: if i remember correctly, ori might not be very popular in solo queue, but she's still a staple midlaner in competitive and she's compared to all other midlaners as the "average"; i don't think she should be changed
Orianna had a 5% prescence in pro play this year when the champ average should be around 7.5%, which is not too far off, she could have used a small buff
To be honest, given that Orianna has been a viable mid laner for most of league's time, I think she deserves some down time.
